description: This file defines the IAuthService interface with methods for authentication-related functionality such as creating tokens, registering, and logging in users.

classes.name: IAuthService
classes.description: Defines authentication service interface with methods for token creation, user registration, and login.

methods.name: CreateToken
methods.description: Generates an authentication token for a given user summary.

methods.name: RegisterAsync
methods.description: Asynchronous method to register a new user with provided registration request data.

methods.name: LoginAsync
methods.description: Asynchronous method to authenticate a user with login credentials.
